snippet.title: Who Invented the Thermos Flask \- Ask.com
snippet.description:
* Who Invented the Thermos Flask \- Ask.com
www.ask.com › Q&A › Shopping › Flowers Gifts and Greetings‎

The thermos flask was invented by Sir James Dewar in 1892. He was a chemist and physicist who was born in Kincardine, Scotland in 1842 and died in 1923.
